nodes.text: Star Wars: Tales of the Jedi — The Sith War (TPB)

The Star Wars: Tales of the Jedi — The Sith War trade paperback is a graphic novel collecting all six issues in the Star Wars: Tales of the Jedi — The Sith War comic series. It was published by Dark Horse Comics on July 1, 1996.

To become a Jedi, it is not the Force one must learn to control but oneself. Ulic Qel-Droma has spent a lifetime learning to control the Force. But now, having tasted power, Qel-Droma cannot fight the dark hunger inside him...
